actions.committee: Senate Committee on Labor and Public Welfare
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Labor and Public Welfare.

official_title: A bill to extend and strengthen certain programs under the Higher Education Act of 1965, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Higher Education Amendments - Extends and authorizes increased appropriations for student aid and vocational education programs under the Higher Education Act. Authorizes the Commissioner of Education to develop and carry out arrangements to improve collection procedures for the repayment of loans under title IV of the Higher Education Act.

titles.title: A bill to extend and strengthen certain programs under the Higher Education Act of 1965, and for other purposes.
